name: Jet Set Willy: Manic Miner
overview: Just when you thought there was nothing left to be seen in the world of Jet Set Willy mods, along comes Jet Set Willy: Manic Miner to confound your expectations! Taking the individual screens of Manic Miner and converting them into a Jet Set Willy map, the game is a real puzzle as you try and work out how to move your way around what appear to be a series of dead ends - particularly in some of the earlier versions of the hack.
